name: Adversator
description:
To play this game please click on download button.

Adversator is a casual moba wich is meant to be played without constraints.
Unlike other moba's:
- You can login or play as a guest.
- You can stay and finish the game or leave anytime without consequences.
- There are only 3 heroes type, the game rely on items combinations.
- The game is easy to master!
